name: Low Desert Punk (itch)
description:
Low Desert Punk is a stoner trip in the desert on a 50s chevy pickup.

Is also a psychedelic open world infinite runner with stoner rock soundtrack.

You must avoid karma guardians and collect karma pieces to clear your way on Samsara.

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrows to move

Space to boost and smash enemies

Enjoy some trippy moments.

Playing it loud using headphones is highly recommended.

This is a demo version limited by 69 seconds of gameplay per play.

Check the full version on Steam.
